summary: Auto-mode session: selecting CHAT-002 (Configure TailwindCSS with design system tokens). Dependencies satisfied (CHAT-001 done). Phase 1 progress: 2/8 tickets completed (25%). CHAT-001 and CHAT-003 completed in previous sessions.

next_ticket_details.title: Configure TailwindCSS with design system tokens

recommendations: CHAT-002 is a small-complexity ticket that unblocks CHAT-004 (layout shell) and CHAT-032 (theme system) -- completing it quickly maximizes downstream throughput.
After CHAT-002, prioritize CHAT-005 (env/CORS config, high priority, small complexity) and CHAT-008 (TypeScript types, high priority, medium complexity) as they unblock Phase 2 tickets.
CHAT-006 (WebSocket infrastructure) is large complexity but high priority and unblocks streaming and real-time features in Phases 2 and 5 -- schedule it early.
